thread.title: Intellia Therapeutics raises $70mm in Series B round
thread.title_full: Intellia Therapeutics raises $70mm in Series B round

title: Intellia Therapeutics raises $70mm in Series B round
text:
Intellia Therapeutics raises $70mm in Series B round Deal Date: Sep-01-2015 / Deal # 201530676 Executive Summary 
Intellia Therapeutics Inc. (gene editing utilizing CRISPR/Cas9 technology) raised $70mm in its Series B round led by OrbiMed HealthCare Fund Management, which takes a board seat. Fidelity Management & Research Co., Janus Capital Management, Foresite Capital, Sectoral Asset Management, EcoR1 Capital, and other investors participated, along with returning buyers Atlas Venture and partner Novartis AG . Leerink Partners was the placement agent.
